00034 bool AbstractGameState::mouseHit(const int mouseX, const int mouseY,
00035                 const int x, const int y, const int w, const int h) {
00036         if (mouseX >= x && mouseX <= (x + w) && mouseY >= y && mouseY <= (y + h)) {
00037                 return true;
00038         }
00039         return false;
00040 }

00053 const string AbstractGameState::intToString(const int number) {
00054         stringstream ss;
00055         string str;
00056         ss << number;
00057         ss >> str;
00058         return str;
00059 }

00064 const vector<string> AbstractGameState::getFilesInDir(const string dir) {
00065         DIR *open_dir = NULL;
00066         struct dirent *dirp;
00067         vector<string> files;
00068 
00069         if ((open_dir = opendir(dir.c_str())) == NULL) {
00070                 files.push_back("There are no maps");
00071         } else {
00072                 while ((dirp = readdir(open_dir)) != NULL) {
00073                         string filename = dirp->d_name;
00074                         size_t find_pos = filename.find_last_of('.');
00075                         if (filename.substr(find_pos) == ".txt" && filename != ".txt") {
00076                                 files.push_back(filename);
00077                         }
00078                 }
00079         }
00080         closedir(open_dir);
00081 
00082         return files;
00083 }
